description: A variant of Shingen no Ichigeki where instead of delivering a punch, Whitebeard grabs his opponent's head and concentrates his Gura Gura no Mi vibrations around it, resulting in crushing damage capable of shattering helmets and defeating giants.
firstUseContext: Whitebeard used this technique to defeat the giant Vice Admiral Lonz in a single blow during the Marineford War.

description: Gecko Moria summons his shadow clone Doppelman and condenses shadows into a massive tower until it takes the form of a spear large enough to impale even giants like Little Oars Jr.
firstUseContext: Used to deliver the finishing blow to Little Oars Jr. during the Marineford War, impaling him through the midsection.
